name: ConnectQueues
desc: Creates and configures the buffers that store the data moving to and from the device.
declaration: virtual kern_return_t ConnectQueues(IOBufferMemoryDescriptor **ifmd, IOMemoryDescriptor **rxqmd, IOMemoryDescriptor **txqmd, IOMemoryDescriptor *in_rxqmd, IOMemoryDescriptor *in_txqmd, uint32_t in_rxqoffset, uint32_t in_txqoffset, uint8_t in_rxqlogsz, uint8_t in_txqlogsz);
